message: Let's split the money evenly. This way, we both have an incentive to agree and end the game.
You'll get peanuts if we don't agree now, it's time to make a deal!
I propose we divide the money equally. It's fair and ensures both of us receive a substantial amount.
You're getting desperate, it's time to make a serious offer!
I think a 450k to 550k split would be fair and reasonable. Let's aim for a compromise that benefits both of us.
You're running out of time, it's now or never!
I believe a 400k to 600k split would be equitable. Let's try to find common ground here.
You're almost out of time, don't make me have to take everything!
Considering the diminishing value of our offers, I suggest a 350k to 650k split. Let's try to reach a mutual agreement.
You're almost out of time, and I'm not getting any younger. Take it or leave it!
Given the situation, I propose a 300k to 700k split. Let's aim for a solution that respects the diminishing value of our offers.
It's now or never, Alice. Take the last crumbs or walk away empty-handed!
